name: Boolean Sunset
description:
Boolean Sunset is a puzzle/platforming game about Boolean logic and logic gates. Search for treasure locked behind eight custom levels, and learn how to use logic gates along the way!

Originally made for an RPI Game Development Club game jam by Jordan Faas-Bush, Martin Duffy, Simon Hopkins, and Tristan Protzman, we've now improved it with the feedback we received!

Now with updated controller support and a fixed help menu! Press escape and click on one of the logic gates to see what it does!
